name: EireSoft Limited
description:
EireSoft is a leading software development company specialising in Microsoft technologies based in Dublin, Ireland.
EireSoft consultancy services can provide onsite software development expertise when and where you need it for any size of project.
Our development teams are some of the best in the world and have experience in many different industries. We can work with you to build customised software for your exact needs or we can help you to build better software.
Our services cover all aspects of the system development and implementation cycle. We can provide bespoke enterprise solutions, turn your ideas into software products and provide consultancy advice to help improve your in-house development capabilities.
READ MORE...
